artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige II; Publisher: Hiranoya Shinzō; Carver: Ōta Tashichi

medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Pride of Edo: Thirty-Six Amusements (Edo jiman sanjūrokkyō 江戸自慢三十六興)

title: Hashiba Ferry in Snow
